questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Velorina at Port Phasmatys. (Chat 1•1•✓)
additionalStepInformation: She is located in the northernmost building just east of the entrance.
You must have the Ghostspeak amulet equipped

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Necrovarus at the Ectofuntus just outside the town, to the North.
Obtain bucket of slime now for later in quest. Use trap door on west side of the Ectofuntus.
Speak to Velorina. (Chat 1)
Teleport to Canifis using the lodestone.
Run north-west to Netty's house which is on the east side of the Slayer Tower, speak to Netty in her house. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: If you haven't already made nettle tea, run south of Netty's house and cut down a swamp tree for logs. Light a fire and use the Nettle-water on it to get Nettle tea. It is possible to accidentally boil your tea over.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Netty to get her porcelain cup.
Use your nettle tea on her cup, and add your bucket of milk to it.
Speak to Netty again. (Chat 1)
Repair the model ship with the silk.
Go inside the ship wreck just north of the allotment patches, east of the Canifis lodestone.
Climb the ladders to reach the top deck (there is a ladder on the outer cabin wall).

Wait for the "wind speed" to become "low", search the mast to determine the colours and their positions which are top, bottom, and skull emblem then use the dye on the ship to the corresponding colours.
additionalStepInformation: red and blue dye makes purple dye

questSteps.stepDescription: Climb down and enter the captain's cabin.
Speak to the old man. (Chat 3)
Use the key on the chest and open it for a map scrap.
Go to the north-west part of the ship's deck and cross the gangplank to the rocks. Jump across rocks to the chest and search it.
Go back to the ship and climb down to the lowest level of the ship, and open a chest in the eastern end of the ship. Kill the giant lobster and search the chest again.
Put the pieces together to get the map and go back to Port Phastmatys.

Speak to the ghost captain on the south-east docks (the one with the smaller boat, not the one directly east of Velorina) to get a ride to Dragontooth Island. Alternatively, use right-click 'Travel'. (Chat 1)
Stand under the Saradomin statue's extended arm (west-adjacent to the statue). Use the "follow" option on the treasure map, or walk the steps in Additional Information then dig to receive a book.
Go back to Port Phasmatys with the ghost captain.
Speak to Ak-Haranu (who is not a ghost) around the docks. (Chat 1)
Go to the inn and speak to Robin. (Chat 2•1)
additionalStepInformation: Win 4 games of Rune-Draw against him to get a signed oak shield bow.
The easiest method is to choose "draw" until one player loses by drawing a death rune and repeating this until you have four wins total.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Ak-Haranu to get the translation manual.
Ask the Ghost innkeeper (Who is located in the pub) for a job to get a bed sheet its for you not robin. (Chat 4•1) See Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: Use your bucket of slime on the bedsheet or dip it into the pool of slime.
Charter ships do not allow bedsheets onto the ships.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Gravingas west of the inn to get a petition form. (Chat 1)
Put on your Bedsheet and read Additional Information on collecting signatures for the petition.
additionalStepInformation: Ask the townspeople for signatures until you have 10.
You can get multiple signatures from the same ghost if you ask another ghost first spacebaring of course through the entire conversation.
Some will resist. Just ask others then come back.
If a ghost ask for ecto-tokens, simply leave the conversation and ask the same ghost again.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Necrovarus at the Ectofuntus. Pick up the bone key he drops.
Head upstairs, and use the KEY on the locked door with the coffin inside.
Open and search the coffin for Necrovarus' mystical robes.
Return to the Netty in her shack (east of the Slayer Tower). (Chat 1)
Equip the enchanted ghostspeak amulet and speak to Necrovarus near the ectofuntus. (Chat 1)
Speak to Velorina in northern Port Phasmatys (at this point you can enter without needing to pay ecto-tokens).
Quest complete!
